concept.title: Concept
concept.shortdesc: The concept topic is one of the three base DITA information types.

conbody.p: Concept topics are used to document conceptual or overview information. They contain background information that users must know before they can successfully work with a product or within a process. Concepts can be broken into sections, but they are primarily comprised of simple paragraphs and unordered lists.
Concept topics answer the question what is?.
The root element of a concept topic is concept.
